title: INTEGRATION_world_reset test failure in gazebo6 branch

content.raw:
After merging pull request #1790 (`event_fix` branch), the `INTEGRATION_world_reset` test was broken. The test fails during `PhysicsEngines/WorldResetTest.WorldName/10` or `PhysicsEngines/WorldResetTest.WorldName/11` (both simbody test instances).

~~~
$ test/integration/INTEGRATION_world_reset --gtest_filter="*/10"
Note: Google Test filter = */10
[==========] Running 1 test from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 1 test from PhysicsEngines/WorldResetTest
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/WorldResetTest.WorldName/10
[Dbg] [world_reset.cc:82] Physics engine [simbody] world name [worlds/pr2.world] reset count [1]
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.90
...
[Err] [SimbodyLink.cc:221] SetWorldPose (OnPoseChange) for child links need testing.
INTEGRATION_world_reset: /tmp/buildd/simbody-3.5.1/Simbody/src/MobilizedBody.cpp:333: SimTK::Real& SimTK::MobilizedBody::updOneFromUPartition(const SimTK::State&, int, SimTK::Vector&) const: Assertion `0 <= which && which < nu' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~

The [backtrace](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/62c2fa80d4eaa72d00a5) implicates `SimbodyScrewJoint::SetVelocity`, which is called by `Joint::Reset`.
content.html:
After merging pull request #1790 (event_fix branch), the INTEGRATION_world_reset test was broken. The test fails during PhysicsEngines/WorldResetTest.WorldName/10 or PhysicsEngines/WorldResetTest.WorldName/11 (both simbody test instances).

$ test/integration/INTEGRATION_world_reset --gtest_filter="*/10"
Note: Google Test filter = */10
[==========] Running 1 test from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 1 test from PhysicsEngines/WorldResetTest
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/WorldResetTest.WorldName/10
[Dbg] [world_reset.cc:82] Physics engine [simbody] world name [worlds/pr2.world] reset count [1]
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.90
...
[Err] [SimbodyLink.cc:221] SetWorldPose (OnPoseChange) for child links need testing.
INTEGRATION_world_reset: /tmp/buildd/simbody-3.5.1/Simbody/src/MobilizedBody.cpp:333: SimTK::Real& SimTK::MobilizedBody::updOneFromUPartition(const SimTK::State&, int, SimTK::Vector&) const: Assertion `0 <= which && which < nu' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)

The backtrace implicates SimbodyScrewJoint::SetVelocity, which is called by Joint::Reset.
